title: Episode #48: Jack Goldsmith Speaks at Hoover to and on the National Security Press
itunes:title: Episode #48: Jack Goldsmith Speaks at Hoover to and on the National Security Press
itunes:subtitle: In the third and final installment of our series of sessions from the October 25 Hoover Media Colloquium, Jack goes mano a mano with the press corps on national security leaks and journalism.
description:
In the third and final installment of our series of sessions from the October 25 Hoover Media Colloquium, Jack goes mano a mano with the press corps on national security leaks and journalism. 

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
